trans-unit.source: Sum of the planned costs with which cost objects were debited.

seg-source.mrk: Sum of the planned costs with which cost objects were debited.

trans-unit.source: Fixed part of the planned cost credit.

seg-source.mrk: Fixed part of the planned cost credit.

trans-unit.source: Fixed part of the planned cost debit.

seg-source.mrk: Fixed part of the planned cost debit.

trans-unit.source: Plan costs are updated based on the result of material standard cost.

seg-source.mrk: Plan costs are updated based on the result of material standard cost.

target.mrk: 계획 원가는 자재 표준 원가의 결과를 기준으로 업데이트됩니다.
